author: Jack Rathborn, Jack Rathborn
title: Coronavirus: Nearly 800 bodies collected by police from homes in Ecuador's virus epicentre
description: Guayaquil's mortuary system has collapsed under the strain of Covid-19
content:
Almost 800 bodies have been collected from homes in Guayaquil by police as coronavirus continues to take its toll on the Ecuadorian citys emergency services, hospitals and funeral parlours.
The Pacific port city has emerged as the epicentre of the virus in t… [+2161 chars]
